contentencoded:
Around the holidays you indulge, or try not to indulge, in many things.

We want to hear your story. How does it affect you financially, or what do you try to keep from yourself?

Lizzie O'Leary speaks with Louis Barajas on where you should splurge, and where you should save.
title: Your Wallet: Indulgence
teaser: Around the holidays you indulge, what do you try to keep from yourself?
description: Around the holidays you indulge, what do you try to keep from yourself?
